data.title: Members
data.meta_description: The Responsible Business Alliance is the world’s largest industry coalition dedicated to responsible business conduct in global supply chains.
data.text:
Beginning with eight members in 2004, today the RBA core membership (not counting initiative-only members) is comprised of more than 250 electronics, retail, auto and toy companies. In addition to RBA members, thousands of companies that are Tier 1 suppliers to members are required to implement the RBA Code of Conduct.

The RBA and its Responsible Minerals, Labor and Factory Initiatives have more than 500 members with combined annual revenues of greater than $7.7 trillion, directly employing over 21.5 million people, with products manufactured in more than 120 countries.

Learn about member benefits and requirements

The RBA has four membership categories: Full, Regular, Affiliate, and Supporter. View the requirements of each category here. Full and Regular members are designated by an “F” or “R” following their company names below:
